snippet.title: M.O.Z.I. - Gameplay Trailer #1
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2659040/MOZI/

M.O.Z.I. is a story-driven first-person shooter with elements of horror, survival, and tower defense. You’ll escort a transport to one of the last human settlements, crossing dangerous, war-torn lands. You’ll need to gather food and batteries, fend off monsters, mutants, crazed humans, wild animals, and other threats. As you navigate this perilous journey and interact with your companion, you’ll uncover the mystery of your past and shape your future.

Follow us on Twitter - https://x.com/Mihanikus_Games
